description:
Who says you need different packs for work and play? Split the difference: the Quasar Daypack can handle whatever you need it to do. Securing a laptop on your daily commute? Check. Comfortable carrying for dawn-to-dusk day hikes? Check. Clamshell opening and tons of pockets for easy packing for long weekends? Check and check. A removable waistbelt comes in handy when you want to carry a whole watermelon to the summit but comes off for a more streamlined look on your way to the office. Side pockets hold water bottles or an umbrella, while front bungees let you stuff in a rain jacket or extra sweater. Is there anything this pack can't do?

  • Mesh-covered die-cut foam shoulder straps and AirScape™ back panel are lightweight and let air flow
  • Webbing waistbelt can be deployed to help with heavy loads or removed when you don't need it
  • Wide clamshell zippered opening gives you easy access to the large main compartment
  • Scratch-resistant top zip pocket holds sunnies or a phone
  • Secondary compartment has tons of internal organization with laptop sleeve, pockets and slots for pens, keys, cards and other items
  • Side stretch-mesh pockets hold water bottles or snacks
  • Separate sleeve carries your tablet
  • Front panel zigzag bungees let you lash on a jacket
  • Blinky light loop ensures you'll be seen on after-dark bike commutes
name: Osprey Quasar 26 Daypack - Unisex
